descriptionHtml:
[color=#f1c232]Sliced Bread adds boiled eggs, baked ash yams and eight new types of sandwiches (roast beef, grilled eider cheese, grilled goat cheese, chicken, leek, slaughterfish, salmon and skeever) to the world of Skyrim.  It also adds recipes for grilled leeks and charred skeever meat.

Leveled lists are not modified, so cooking is the only way to get these new items.  If there is interest, I could add them to the leveled lists for vendors so you could purchase them at the local inn, but for simplicity and maximum compatibility, right now they are only available as recipes at the cook stations.
[/color]
[color=#f1c232]To avoid clutter in your cooking menu, some of the cooking recipes added by this mod will only appear in the cooking menu if you have the required ingredients in your inventory.[/color]
[color=#f1c232]
The effects added by the new sandwiches are vanilla food effects, so they do stack just like the effects from soups in vanilla Skyrim.  This was also done for maximum compatibility. A patch has been added under Optional files to make give Sliced Bread effects from my other mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71708/?]Immersive Ingestibles[/url], which prevents the effects from stacking.  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71708/?]Immersive Ingestibles[/url] is required for this patch.

The foods added by Sliced Bread have the VendorItemFood keyword so they should work fine with iNeed.[/color]

[color=#f1c232]Load order should not matter. [/color]

[color=#ff0000][size=2]This should be safe to install or uninstall at any time, but make sure there are no active food effects on your character when installing, uninstalling or upgrading this mod.[/size]
[/color]
[size=3]Credits for the sandwich meshes go to ScollThief84; credits for the RND patch go to Dragonjet.[/size]
author: Turija --  who goes by the username Acerac on Nexus
